text: Ra aphno dharmaka anuyayiharu baheka aru kasaiko visvasa nagarnu. He paigambara! Bhanidinus ki pathapradarsana ta nihsandeha allahako pathapradarsana nai ho. Tiniharu yo pani bhandachan ki yasama pani visvasa nagarnu ki juna kuro timila'i pradana gari'eko ho, tyasto aru kasaila'i pradana garincha. Va tiniharule timisamga allahako agadi jhagada garnechan. Yo pani bhanidinus! Ki bujurgi (anugraha) ta allahako hatama cha. Usale jasala'i cahancha, pradana gardacha ra allaha sarvavyapi (ra) sarvajna cha
